title: Chinese manufacturers looking to dodge steep U.S. tariffs are pushing across the border to make their goods in Vietnam. This wasn't exactly the desired outcome of Trump's trade war.
China’s exports grew at a faster clip in June, topping market expectations as trade tensions with the U.S. eased following a round of bilateral talks
